name: gcal-wari
description: Assisting creation of timetable on Google Calendar.

scripts.build:js: cat src_client/client.js | sed -e '1 i <script>' -e '$ a </script>' > app/script.js.html
scripts.build:css: cat src_client/style.css | sed -e '1 i <style>' -e '$ a </style>' > app/style.css.html
scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css & npm run build:html && npm run push && npm run open
